body:
- Add version 0.23.0
- Fix to enable the compilation of py-horovod on aarch64 system. This fix avoids the multiple definitions that occur when building Eigen. This is discussed in [GitLab: libeigen/eigen/Commits/fd1dcb6b](https://gitlab.com/libeigen/eigen/-/commit/fd1dcb6b45a2c797ad4c4d6cc7678ee70763b4ed).
title: py-horovod: add version 0.23.0 and fix to build on aarch64
